item.description:
We'll be meeting Wed. Jan. 19th from 6:30-8:30 due to the storm today. We'll continue our discussion after watching another segment of Deepak Chopra. All ideas are welcome and if anyone has been reading anything insightful we'd love you to bring it in.

I'm grateful to be able to get together with a great group of people who are intentionally going to pave the outcome of what they want in life. This is what leads to happiness... :)

Happy New Year and look forward to seeing everyone Wednesday night!

Caryn

PS Location is the same and new people will be sent directions. A small fee ($2-3) is collected to help cover costs.
item.name: Law of Attraction
